entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
